name: Mixed Bag 15 Quiz | Mixed 10 Q. Difficult [D] | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what year was the Empire State Building completed?
questions.explanation:
1931.

	It is located in New York City and at one time was the tallest building in the world. There are a few other structures that are now taller.

questions.text: Which coffee company sponsored 'The Burns and Allen Radio Show'?
questions.explanation:
Maxwell House.

	They made their radio debut in 1930 in England moving to the United States in 1932.

questions.text: Name the last of the thirteen original colonies to be settled.
'Broadway' was the name of which U.S.'s prison's main cell block?
Who played Gloria Wandrous in the movie 'Butterfield Eight'?
questions.explanation:
Elizabeth Taylor.

	Elizabeth Taylor was born in England. She won an Oscar for her role in 'Butterfield Eight'.

questions.text: How many times do the words 'United States' appear on a dollar bill?
Lily Tomlin's 'Edith Ann' had a dog named what?
About how many quarts are there in a magnum of champagne?
questions.explanation:
2.

	There are just about 2 quarts in a magnum.

questions.text: Who played Sgt. Chip Saunders in the TV show 'Combat'?
questions.explanation:
Vic Morrow.

	This was an early TV series.

questions.text: Which World War II general competed in the 1912 Olympic Pentathlon?
